= !SystemProductName class function =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

*Class:* _[TPJComputerInfo TPJComputerInfo]_

*Introduced:* v4.0

{{{
class function SystemProductName: string;
}}}

== Description ==

Returns the product name of the host computer.

The returned name does not include the name of the computer's manufacturer. To get that, use the _[TPJComputerInfoSystemManufacturer SystemManufacturer]_ property.
